SELECT r.restaurant_code, r.restaurant_name, r.restaurant_location, r.restaurant_category, r.restaurant_people_number, r.restaurant_contents, r.restaurant_score, r.created_at FROM restaurant r
r.restaurant_category = #{category}
ORDER BY r.restaurant_name ASC
ORDER BY r.restaurant_score DESC
ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

SELECT r.restaurant_code, r.restaurant_name, r.restaurant_location, r.restaurant_category, r.restaurant_people_number, r.restaurant_contents, r.restaurant_score, k.keyword, r.created_at FROM restaurant r LEFT JOIN restaurant_keyword rk ON r.restaurant_code = rk.restaurant_code LEFT JOIN keyword k ON rk.keyword_code = k.keyword_code
r.restaurant_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{restaurant_name}, '%')
AND
k.keyword LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND
r.restaurant_category = #{category}
GROUP BY r.restaurant_code, r.restaurant_name, r.restaurant_location, r.restaurant_category, r.restaurant_people_number, r.restaurant_contents, r.restaurant_score, k.keyword, r.created_at ORDER BY r.restaurant_name ASC

SELECT r.restaurant_code AS restaurantCode, r.restaurant_name AS restaurantName, r.restaurant_location AS restaurantLocation, r.restaurant_category AS restaurantCategory, r.restaurant_people_number AS restaurantPeopleNumber, r.restaurant_contents AS restaurantContents, r.restaurant_score AS restaurantScore, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT p.restaurant_picture_url) AS pictureUrls, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT k.keyword) AS keywords, r.created_at AS createdAt FROM restaurant r LEFT JOIN restaurant_picture p ON r.restaurant_code = p.restaurant_code LEFT JOIN restaurant_keyword rk ON r.restaurant_code = rk.restaurant_code LEFT JOIN keyword k ON rk.keyword_code = k.keyword_code WHERE r.restaurant_code = #{restaurantCode} GROUP BY r.restaurant_code, r.restaurant_name, r.restaurant_location, r.restaurant_category, r.restaurant_people_number, r.restaurant_contents, r.restaurant_score, r.created_at
